step.text: I enter username "valid@example.com" and password "password123"
I click the login button
I should be redirected to the dashboard
I should see the welcome message "Welcome, John!"
I enter username "invalid@example.com" and password "wrongpassword"
I click the login button
I should see the error message "Invalid credentials"
I should remain on the login page
I leave the username field empty
I leave the password field empty
I click the login button
I should see the validation error "Username and password are required"
I enter username "" and password ""
I click the login button
I should be redirected to the ""
I should see the role-specific message ""
I send a POST request to "/users" with the following data:
the response status code should be 201
the response should contain "user_id"
the response should contain "John Doe"
a user with ID "123" exists
I send a GET request to "/users/123"
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain "name"
the response should contain "email"
a user with ID "123" exists
I send a PUT request to "/users/123" with the following data:
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain "Jane Doe"
a user with ID "123" exists
I send a DELETE request to "/users/123"
the response status code should be 204
the user should be deleted
I send a GET request to "/users?page=1&limit=10"
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain "users"
the response should contain "total_count"
the response should contain "page"
I send a GET request to "/users/search?email=john@example.com"
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain "users"
each user should have "email" field
I tap the profile icon
I should see the profile screen
I should see my profile information
I tap the search icon
I enter "laptop" in the search field
I tap the search button
I should see search results
I should see at least 5 products
I am on the product details screen
I tap the "Add to Cart" button
I should see the success message "Item added to cart"
the cart icon should show "1" items
I am on the product details screen
I swipe left on the product image
I should see the next product image
I swipe right on the product image
I should see the previous product image
I am on the products screen
I scroll down
I should see more products
I should see the loading indicator
I scroll to the bottom
I should see "Load More" button
I am on the products screen
I tap the filter button
I select "Electronics" category
I tap the apply button
I should see only electronics products
the filter should show "Electronics" as selected
I am logged in to the mobile app
I tap the menu button
I tap the logout option
I should see the confirmation dialog
I tap the confirm button
I should be logged out
I should see the login screen
